property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: You may remove up to 3 non-character cards in an opponent's discard pile from the game. If you do, reduce this card's numeric cost by the number of cards removed. Pick a character.
If the character has 4 life or less, destroy it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is restored, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, you may put that card on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: omahkapi'si, seraphim, dragon

property.name: Text
property.value:
TACTICAL, UNIQUE OMAHKAPI'SI
While there are at least 10 cards in an opponent's discard pile, that player cannot pick this card.
FLEX
COST: Pay 2. Pick a card in an opponent's discard pile.
EFFECT: Remove that card from the game. If you do, this card gains 2 strength this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick an opponent.
Look at the top 4 cards of that player's deck and put them back in any order. If you control an attacking party of at least 2 members, you may put up to 3 cards from the top of that player's deck into their discard pile.
FLIP UP: 4 [D]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
If the character would leave play this turn, put it into its owner's hand instead.
FLIP UP: 1 [D]

property.name: Text
property.value:
[D][D][V][V]: When this card enters play, leaves play, attacks, or blocks, you may look at the top card of any deck.
FLIP UP: 1 [V][V][V][V]

property.name: Text
property.value:
If you would inflict damage to an opponent's faction, for each damage you would inflict, you may put up to that many cards from the top of its owner's deck into their discard pile instead.
When a player has no cards in their deck, they lose the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: FLIP UP: 8 [D]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
Remove the character from the game if it has X life or less, where X is the number of different trades among cards you control.
FLIP UP: 2 [D]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Play this only during your turn. Pick a faction.
Destroy all items and locations. If you control cards with 'UNIQUE JO', 'UNIQUE EUSTACE', 'UNIQUE PLUCK', 'UNIQUE RUDOLPHUS', and 'UNIQUE IGNATIOUS', inflict 15 damage to the faction and each character that faction's controller controls.
FLIP UP: 6 [O][G][E][D][R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE QUILT
When this card enters play and at the start of each of your turns, name a non-[V] resource icon. X is that icon. Until the start of your next turn, this card gains "PROVIDES: X".
HAND IT DOWN
COST: Pay 1. Shuffle this card into its owner's deck.
EFFECT: Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
[O]: This card gains COVERT.
[G]: This card gains 2 life.
[E]: This card gains AGGRO.
[D]: This card gains 1 speed.
[R]: This card gains 2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE WASTELAND
When this card is inflicted damage by a character, destroy the character.
At the start of your turn, put a token on this card.
When there are at least 3 tokens on this card, void all non-resource cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
[O]: This turn, the character gains COVERT.
[G]: This turn, the character gains 2 life.
[E]: This turn, the character gains AGGRO.
[D]: This turn, the character gains 1 speed.
[R]: This turn, the character gains 2 strength.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: soldier, tyrant

property.name: Text
property.value:
BLEED
COST: Pick a character in battle. Destroy a resource you control.
EFFECT: Inflict 2 damage to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only not during a battle. Pick a character.
This turn, the character gains strength equal to its numeric cost. You may play a resource.
FLIP UP: 3 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE MCLARGEHUGE
EXTRA COST: Destroy 2 resources you control.
When this card leaves play, you may play a resource or pick an opponent and that player destroys a face-down resource they control.
FLIP UP: 4 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
HEMORAGE
COST: Destroy this card. Pick a faction or character.
EFFECT: Inflict 4 damage to that card.
FLIP UP: 4 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only during your turn.
Each player destroys 2 character they own. Otherwise, destroy all of that player's characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
[R][R][R][R][R][R]: When this card enters play, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 5 damage to it.
FLIP UP: 4 [R][R][R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
This card enters play with 4 tokens on it.
When this card has no tokens on it, flip it face-down under its owner's control.
CONVERT
COST: Remove a token from this card. Destroy a non-"micromajig" character you control.
EFFECT: Each opponent destroys a character they control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
This character cannot attack.
[R][R][R][R][R][R]: This card gains 4 life and loses all other rules text.

property.name: Text
property.value:
You may pick a character. If you do, inflict 1 damage to the character. If you control an attacking party of at least 2 members, you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 2 damage to the character.
FLIP UP: 4 [R] and you may pick an item. If you do, destroy it.

property.name: Text
property.value: FLIP UP: 1 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE STRONGHOLD
At the end of your turn, you may search your deck for a warlord character and reveal it. If you do, put it on top of your deck.
When you deploy a character, X is that character's numeric cost and you may pick a faction. If you do, inflict X damage to that faction and put X damage markers on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
At the end of your turn, if this card is depleted, destroy it.
[R][R][R][R][R][R]: This character gains 1 strength and 1 speed.

property.name: Text
property.value: You opponents may only play tactics during their own turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE BLESSING
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
When this card enters play, inflict 1 damage to all characters.
The attached character gains the following rules text: "At the start of each turn, inflict 1 damage to all your characters.
All your characters gain 1 strength."

property.name: Subtype
property.value: fighter, tough guy

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE GOR-BLACH
GET IN THERE: [V][V][V]
COST: Deplete this card. Pick a blocked character you control. X is its strength. Pay X.
EFFECT: Destroy the character. Inflict X damage to an opponent's faction. Inflict X damage to this card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When a character you control with a token on it leaves play, you may pick a character with less strength than that character and restore it.
IMPLANT
COST: Deplete this card. Pay 2. Pick a character you control.
EFFECT: Put a token on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character in your discard pile.
Draw a card. Put the character on top of its owner's deck or into play under its owner's control as a face-down resource.
FLIP UP: 2 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
Inflict 1 damage to that character. If it is destroyed by that damage, you may pick another character and
 inflict 1 damage to it. If it is destroyed by that damage, you may pick another character and inflict 1
damage to it. If it is destroyed by that damage, you may pick another character and inflict 1 damage to it.
FLIP UP: 4 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
PUSH
COST: Pay 1. Deplete a character you control.
EFFECT: This turn, this card gains 2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is restored, you may pick a faction. If you do, inflict 1 damage to it.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: rudo, blade of questionable morality

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE RUDOLPHUS
FEALTY: While this card is in your hand and you control at least 4 staple resources of different trades, reduce this card's threshold requirement by any 3 resource icons.
When this card attacks, you may pay 2. If you do, each character you control gains 2 strength this turn.
When this card is destroyed, you may search your deck for a warlord character and reveal it. If you do, put it on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card inflicts battle damage to a faction, you may put a resource you control into its owner's hand. If you do, inflict 1 damage to all characters.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
The attached character gains 1 strength.
BULK UP
COST: Pay 1. Destroy a card named "Rage" you own.
EFFECT: This turn, the attached character gains 1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Characters with a token on them cannot block this card.
If a character enters play under your opponent's control, you may pay 1. If you do, put a token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character or location.
If the card has a [V] icon in its rules text, inflict 6 damage to the card. Otherwise, inflict 2 damage to the card.
FLIP UP: 1 [R][R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character or location.
If the card has a [V] icon in its rules text, inflict 6 damage to the card. Otherwise, inflict 2 damage to the card.
FLIP UP: 1 [R][R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card inflicts battle damage to a faction, put this character into its owner's hand.
FLIP UP: 0 [R]

property.name: Text
property.value:
[R][R][V][V]: This card gains 4 strength. When this card leaves play, you may pick a character. If you do, that character gains 4 strength this turn.
FLIP UP: 7 [V][V][V][V]

property.name: Text
property.value:
At the start of your turn, X is this card's strength and you may destroy this character. If you do, inflict X damage to each opponent's faction or pick an item with numeric cost X or less and destroy it.
[V][V][V][V][V]: This card gains 2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
Put a token on the character. If you deployed this card using FLIP UP, put 4 more tokens on the character. Inflict damage to it equal to the number of tokens on it.
FLIP UP: 5 [R]

property.name: Subtype
property.value: vexillarius, seraphim, dragon

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE VEXILLARIUS
All your other characters gain 2 strength and 2 life.
When this card is destroyed, all character lose 2 strength and 2 life this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, you may put a token on up to X non-resource cards, where X is the number of [V] you control.
When this card is destroyed, destroy all non-resource cards with tokens on them.
TURN TO MUSH
COST: Pay 2. Pick a card with a token on it.
EFFECT: Flip the card face-down under its owner's control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.
RECUR: [O][O]
COST: Use this only if this card is in your discard pile. Pay 4. Remove this card from the game.
EFFECT: An opponent discards a card. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
Put the character into its owner's hand.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: pirate, mau

property.name: Text
property.value:
[G][G][G]: When this card enters play, draw a card.
RETREAT
COST: Pay 2. Destroy this card.
EFFECT: Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This turn, cards in play and cards deployed can only be destroyed by costs, and all inflicted damage is reduced to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may search your deck for a card named Elitism and reveal it. If you do, put it into play. Attach it to your faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is destroyed, you may search your deck for an item and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Choose one of the following as this card's rules text:
OPTION 1
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
This turn, the character loses 2 life.
OPTION 2
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
EFFECT: This turn, the character loses 1 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: pluck, grifter

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE PLUCK
GRIFT
COST: Use this only during your turn. Pay 5. Deplete this card. Pick a non-tactic card in an opponent's discard pile.
EFFECT: Put the card into play under your control.
